On either side of the road, there are lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The road itself is lined with power lines, a common sight in many cities. Buildings of various sizes and designs can be seen in the distance, indicating a mix of residential and commercial structures.

The buildings, trees, and power lines all appear stationary, contributing to the overall calmness of the scene.
